    • Method Detail

      • receiveCommitment

        public CmtRBasicCommitPhaseOutput receiveCommitment()
                                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
        Wait for the committer to send the commitment. When the message is received and after reconstructing the group element, save it in the commitmentMap using the id also received in the message.

        Pseudo code:

        "WAIT for message c from C

        STORE values (h,c)".

        Specified by:
        receiveCommitment in interface CmtReceiver
        Returns:
        the id of the commitment and some other information if necessary according to the implementing class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the commitment received cannot be deserialized
        java.io.IOException - if there is any problem at the communication level

      • receiveDecommitment

        public CmtCommitValue receiveDecommitment(long id)
                                   throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                          java.io.IOException
        Wait for the decommitter to send the decommitment message. If there had been a commitment for the requested id then proceed with validation, otherwise reject.
        Specified by:
        receiveDecommitment in interface CmtReceiver
        Parameters:
        id - wait for a specific message according to this id
        Returns:
        the commitment
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the decommitment received cannot be deserialized
        java.io.IOException - if there is any problem at the communication level.

      • verifyDecommitment

        public CmtCommitValue verifyDecommitment(CmtCCommitmentMsg commitmentMsg,
                                CmtCDecommitmentMessage decommitmentMsg)
        Run the decommitment phase of the protocol:

        "IF c = g^r * h^x AND x <- Zq

        OUTPUT ACC and value x

        ELSE

        OUTPUT REJ".

        Specified by:
        verifyDecommitment in interface CmtReceiver
        Parameters:
        commitmentMsg - the commitment object.
        decommitmentMsg - the decommitment object
        Returns:
        the committed value

      • getPreProcessedValues

        public java.lang.Object[] getPreProcessedValues()
        Description copied from interface: CmtReceiver
        Return the values used during the pre-process phase (usually upon construction). Since these values vary between the different implementations this function returns a general array of Objects.
        Specified by:
        getPreProcessedValues in interface CmtReceiver
        Returns:
        a general array of Objects
